name: Shuttered Memories
description:
Overview

Shuttered Memories is a narrative game, Top-Down. Our project involves LOVERZJAM 2021 event. Develop a game in resolution 64x64 pixel and the optional theme of our project is Secret. You're will role-play someone who has to leave the apartment. But you have had to pick up stuff before you move out. You just have 5 slots in your suitcase. Every item has a story and maybe tells something about why you have to move out. When you had done to pick an item. And move out of the apartment you will see the ending cutscene. It's might be a different cutscene depending on you item you choose. Before you left.

Objective

You have to pick the 5 items or less in your apartment to your suitcase.

Control Manual

In-game doesn't have a tutorial please read the control manually

W: Move Up  A: Move Left  S: Move Down  D: Move Right

F: Open suitcase, Pick up item 

E: Put the item in the suitcase (When you open the suitcase only)

Enter: Desire to move out of an apartment (When player open a suitcase)

Esc: Pause menu, Close the suitcase.

Control by keyboard only.

More Detail

The aim of Shuttered Memories project is to increase game development skills. And this game is Early Access the content might be updated soon depend on the team member's desire to continue a project.

NOTE: We are not native English speakers. And we are so sorry about the wrong information in English. Thank you :)
